item.title: Feeling Awesome
item.author: nick@nick64.me (Nick64)
item.description: There are people I would not like to be associated with that are actively making me feel worse and I do not want to be involved with them. Why do I feel this way

item.title: Hugo or Jekyll?
item.author: nick@nick64.me (Nick64)
item.description: I’m debating whether I should go through the effort of learning Jekyll and porting my site to that, or sticking with Hugo. I heard from my good friend realjame that Jekyll (the gen he uses for his blog) is better to him after he tried using Hugo because of the convenience of the tools, but it could just be that he’s used to it. I’ll think on this a little more. In the meantime, I should worry about more important things like school, since finals are starting now for me…

item.title: Not Really Feeling It Today
item.author: nick@nick64.me (Nick64)
item.description: Wanted to write a lot earlier, but honestly I don’t really feel like it right now, I’m just kind of burnt out from working on my art stuff and just doing nothing. Good night.

It’s ok.

item.title: The Sega Genesis is so sexy...
item.author: nick@nick64.me (Nick64)
item.description: Oh man, oh man, I bought a Sega Genesis for 16 dollars today at Goodwill. Opened it up to get a look-see inside and oh my… old hardware and huge chips are so hot… I really dig the look of the internals. Something about the humongous 68000 CPU and the SEGA chips and the Zilog CPU, MAN! It is so AWESOME AND HOTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT. Old hardware is my fetish.
